mailDatas.name: Hospital Tutorial Mail
mailDatas.title: Mail From Hospital
mailDatas.content: As discussed previously, we have put the patient on urgent life support and transferred her to the ICU due to the sudden worsening of her condition. Please kindly remember to make your payment on time. Late payment will not be tolerated.

mailDatas.name: Work Tutorial Mail
mailDatas.title: Work Opportunity!
mailDatas.content: Thank you for your interest in our ad-hoc job program. We are glad to inform you that we have picked out various job opportunities to suit your indicated preferences, and you may take them anytime by dropping by our office during working hours. Your earnings will be paid in cash at the end of the work day. We hope to see you soon!

mailDatas.name: Well Paying Gig Mail
mailDatas.title: Urgent Job!! Extra pay!!
mailDatas.content: XY Company is in urgent need for extra hands today for a full day event. *Note that THIS WILL BE A FULL DAY JOB, and you will be required to be present for the full working day. Please visit our office by morning if you are interested, thanks and regards.

mailDatas.name: billwarningtemplate
mailDatas.title: Late payment warning
mailDatas.content: It has come to our attention that you have missed the payment deadline for the hospital invoice yesterday. We have given you a late payment strike and a warning. Please be aware that there will be no more such chances after this incident, and we will promptly retract our services on the second occurence. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope you have a nice day!
